name: Meat boy (map pack)
description:
Meat Boy Map Pack
The following is a pack of the 70 best meat boy user made maps submitted by YOU over the past 2 months. Your horrible sadists all of you! but you made some awesome levels and here they are for all to play!.

As an extra bonus, we have added 8 new unlockable extras! (4 new playable characters and 4 fully animated alternate endings!) collect bandaids to unlock them all.

Facts about the game:

-The Meat boy map pack is very very Hard!
-You can skip levels by pressing esc and exiting to the level menu.
-Unlock extra characters by collecting band aids.
